

#create config.h by cmake
#version.h is generated by git commit hook
configure_file( tiki.cfg ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/generated/tiki/config.h )
configure_file( version.h ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/generated/tiki/version.h COPYONLY )
message( STATUS "FIX ME | version.h git commit hook" )

add_source( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/core coreSources )
add_executable( core ${coreSources} )
